post.title: VTube Studio
post.description: VTube Studio is the defacto app for Live2D vtubers. The app uses your smartphone or webcam to track your face and animate a Live2D Cubism Model.
post.content:
VTube Studio is the defacto app for Live2D vtubers. The app uses your smartphone or webcam to track your face and animate a Live2D Cubism Model. The model is shown directly on your phone or your PC by streaming the face-tracking data over your local network from your phone to your PC/Mac.

Usage Example

ü¶ôKoziiChu v.4 + SUMMERTIME showcase~ üçãüå∫

-Upscaled, higher res model
-15 toggles
-Cute arm sway~
-I CAN SIT!

Art + Rigging by me!

Motion recorded in VTube Studio
Lighting recorded with Shoost!#VtubersUprising #Live2D #Shoost pic.twitter.com/HT2XxWmsGY

— Kozii!ü¶ô‚Ä¢ on vacation~üß≥„ÄêKAWA„Äëüå∫ „Ç≥„Éº„Ç∏„Éº„Å°„ÇÖ (@koziichu) June 24, 2022

Wanna see more examples? Just search "VTube Studio" on Twitter.
